== Mankulam (628055) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mankulam is a village in the [[Devikulam]] taluka of [[Idukki ]] district with an area of 10446 hectares and harbouring 2513 households with total population of 9595 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kothamangalam]] is at a distance of 88 km. Male population is 4863 and female population is 4732. Scheduled Caste Population is 490 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2099. Census Location Code of the village is 628055<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 7559 (78.78%)
* Literate male population: 3982 (81.88%)
* Literate female population: 3577 (75.59%)
